title: Relatable: Actress Kris Aquino tells bachelors to add her on Facebook
text:
When it comes to matters of the heart, celebrities — they’re just like us. In a recent post on her Instagram account, actress and OG influencer Kris Aquino showed us that the hunt for true love is tough for the rich and famous, too.

In a post that appeared on Aquino’s Instagram account yesterday, the actress announced that she had opened a private Facebook account, and that she only had eight friends in her network. So, she took to her public platform to say that she’s looking for male friends — but only if they meet her criteria.





“If you’re male, please be between 41 to 55, single (you could be widowed, divorced, legally separated, or annulled), and if you’re a DOCTOR (especially a rheumatoid, immunology, allergy specialist, neurologist, anesthesiologist, pain management specialist, or cardiologist) promise I will immediately ACCEPT your friend request,” she wrote in English and Filipino.

Read: WATCH: Comedian shows what a ‘Crazy Rich’ Filipino auntie is like

The former presidential daughter has chronic spontaneous urticaria, an auto-immune disease, which probably explains why she wants to be “friends” with a doctor. But apparently, her two sons Josh and Bimby Aquino are looking at other Facebook friend qualifications.

“My 2 sons said okay w/ them if you’re a pilot who has an international route- hehehe. ([That’s a] preview of what’s ahead of you),” she wrote.

Aquino has a famously interesting dating history. She had her son Josh with former partner Philip Salvador, whom she separated from in 1999. She has been married once: in 2005 to professional basketball player James Yap, with whom she had her son Bimby. Alas, the marriage was annulled seven years later.

Read: Kris Aquino slams Duterte’s long-time assistant Bong Go for joking that ex-partner fooled her

Despite her past heartaches, her fans have remained optimistic that she will eventually find her forever love. None of her followers had anything negative to say about her dating strategy, and even suggested some people they knew.

“My neurosurgeon is very much single at 51, charming, smart, has a bachelor’s degree in Literature (imagine!!!), and could pass as Keanu Reeve’s brother. Too bad he doesn’t have an FB account,” wrote screenwriter @noringai.

Photo: Kris Aquino/IG More

Follower @beltran.bernadette wrote: “I know a bunch of eligible bachelors [here] in the USA. come over lol.”

Photo: Kris Aquino/IG More

One male follower admitted that he doesn’t meet Aquino’s criteria. “I don’t meet madame’s qualifications for being a private friend,” wrote @jerome.m.padilla.

Photo: Kris Aquino/IG More

There were a lot of female fans who also wanted to be Aquino’s Facebook friend. “I hope I could become Miss Kris’ friend on FB,” wrote @itsmariceldepaz.

Photo: Kris Aquino/IG More

What do you think of this dating strategy? Tell us by leaving a comment below or tweeting to @CoconutsManila.
